select go.order_id,g.goods_name,g.goods_price,g.image,u.nick_name,go.price,go.create_time from goods_order as go inner join goods as g on g.goods_id = go.goods_id inner join wx_user as u on u.user_id = go.order_user where 1=1
and g.goods_name like concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
order by go.create_time desc
